title: #2015_4 Height of a street lamp?
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A lamp post is situated at the middle point "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of the side "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of a triangular plot "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ABC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"BC=7 \\text { m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"CA=8 \\text { m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AB=9 \\text { m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Lamp post subtends an angle "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"15^\\circ"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" at the point "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  The height of the lamp post is of the form "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p(q-\\sqrt { r } ) \\text{ m} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then find the sum of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p, q "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"r"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/0HYwSIVjSB-Untitled.png?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"text","text":"AB = 9 = c","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" , "},{"type":"text","text":"BC = 7 = a","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"text","text":"AC = 8 = b","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" is the midpoint of the side "},{"type":"text","text":"AC","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" at which lamp post "},{"type":"text","text":"MP","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" of height "},{"type":"text","text":"h","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" (say) is located Again,it is given that the lamp post subtends an angle "},{"type":"text","text":"15°","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" at "},{"type":"text","text":"B","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Applying Cosine formula in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Delta ABC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"cosC=\frac { { a }^{ 2 }+{ b }^{ 2 }-{ c }^{ 2 } }{ 2ab } =\frac { 49+64-81 }{ 2\times 7\times 8 } =\frac { 2 }{ 7 } \quad \quad \quad \quad --------(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Similarly using cosine formula in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Delta BMC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we get"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ BM }^{ 2 }={ BC }^{ 2 }+{ CM }^{ 2 }-2BC\times CMcosC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"CM=\frac { 1 }{ 2 } CA=\quad 4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" , since  "},{"type":"text","text":"M","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" is the midpoint of AC."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, using (1), we get"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ BM }^{ 2 }=49+16-2\times 7\times 4\times \frac { 2 }{ 7 } =49"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow { BM }=\quad 7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus, from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Delta BMP"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" right angled at "},{"type":"text","text":"M","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":", we have "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"tan15°=\frac { PM }{ BM } =\frac { h }{ 7 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow 2-\sqrt { 3 } =\frac { h }{ 7 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow h=7(2-\sqrt { 3 } )\quad m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow p=7\quad ,q=2\quad and\quad r=3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sum of "},{"type":"text","text":"p","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" , "},{"type":"text","text":"q","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"text","text":"r","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":"="},{"type":"text","text":"7+2+3=12\boxed{12}12​","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By Stewart's Theorem we have"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"BM=\frac 1 2*\sqrt{2AB^2+2BC^2 - AC^2}=7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
In right angled triangle with BM and lamp height as legs and BM making an angle of 15 with hypotenuse , "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
height = BM * Tan15. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Tan15=Tan(45 - 30)= "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2 - \sqrt3.\ \ height =7*(2 - \sqrt3).\ \ 7+2+3=12"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M is the midpoint of AC so using apollonius theorem 
AB^2 + BC^2 = 2(CM^2 + BM^2)
7^2 + 9^2 = 2 ( 4^2 + BM^2)
Solving this we get BM = 7.
Then let the height of lamp be MP
So in triangle BMP , angle PBM is 15
tan 15 = tan(45-30)
tan45 - tan 30/1+tan45tan30
so MP /BM = tan 15
solving this we get MP = 7(2 - sqrt3)
so 7=p , 2 = q and 3 = r
p+q+r = 12"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"In triangle ABC, we get cosA=2/3 by cos rule."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So, we get BM=7 by cos rule."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Then we know that tan(15)=sin(15)/cos(15)=2sin(15)cos(15)/2cos^2(15)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This gives sin(30)/1+cos(30)=1/2+sqrt(3)=2-sqrt(3)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"As tan(15)=x/7, where x is height of post, we get x=7[2-sqrt(3)]."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus a+b+c=7+2+3=12."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To help understand the reasoning behind it, consider: how do trailing zeros exist? When a "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are multiplied, of course. There's always more "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s than "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s, though, so there are as many trailing zeros as there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s. Powers of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" contain multiple "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s, so you need to count them for as many "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s as their power: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"125,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for example, counts as three "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s. Now here's the general expression for number of trailing zeros:
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Z(x) = \sum_{n=1}^{\lfloor\log_5(x)\rfloor}\lfloor\frac{x}{5^n}\rfloor"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Substitute "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = 2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to get
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Z(2015) = \sum_{n=1}^{4}\lfloor\frac{2015}{5^n}\rfloor = \boxed{502}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: Complex Indeed!
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \displaystyle \large \sum_{p=1}^{32} (3p+2) \left [ \sum_{q=1}^{10} \left ( \sin \left ( \frac {2\pi q}{11} \right ) - i \cos \left ( \frac {2\pi q}{11} \right ) \right ) \right ]^p "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I have a  summation within a summation in the above expression. What is its value?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Details and Assumptions","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":":"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an imaginary number such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i^2 = -1 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"More questions?","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"First we take "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ q=1 }^{ 10 }{ \left( sin\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 } -icos\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 }  \right)  } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=-i\sum _{ q=1 }^{ 10 }{ \left( cos\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 } +isin\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 }  \right)  } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\quad -i\sum _{ q=1 }^{ 10 }{ { \left( { e }^{ i\frac { 2\pi  }{ 11 }  } \right)  }^{ q } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=-i\sum _{ q=1 }^{ 10 }{ { \alpha  }^{ q } } \quad \quad ,where\quad \alpha ={ e }^{ i\frac { 2\pi  }{ 11 }  }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=-i\frac { \alpha (1-{ \alpha  }^{ 10 }) }{ 1-\alpha  } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=-i\frac { (\alpha -{ \alpha  }^{ 11 }) }{ 1-\alpha  } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=-i\frac { \alpha -1 }{ 1-\alpha  } \quad \quad \quad \quad bcz\quad { e }^{ i\frac { 2\pi  }{ 11 } \times 11 }={ e }^{ i2\pi  }=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Longrightarrow \sum _{ q=1 }^{ 10 }{ \left( sin\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 } -icos\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 }  \right)  } =i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"---------(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now ,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ p=1 }^{ 32 }{ (3p+2){ \left[ \sum _{ q=1 }^{ 10 }{ \left( sin\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 } -icos\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 }  \right)  }  \right]  }^{ p } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"="},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ p=1 }^{ 32 }{ (3p+2){ i }^{ p } } \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad ,using\quad (1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"="},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3\sum _{ p=1 }^{ 32 }{ p{ i }^{ p } } +2\sum _{ p=1 }^{ 32 }{ { i }^{ p } } =3A+2B\quad \quad \quad \quad -----(2)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\quad A=i+{ 2i }^{ 2 }+{ 3i }^{ 3 }+......+{ 32i }^{ 32 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\therefore \quad Ai={ i }^{ 2 }+{ 2i }^{ 3 }+{ 3i }^{ 4 }+......+{ 31i }^{ 32 }+{ 32i }^{ 33 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\quad \therefore \quad A(1-i)=(i+{ i }^{ 2 }+{ i }^{ 3 }+{ i }^{ 4 }+......+{ i }^{ 32 })-{ 32i }^{ 33 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\quad \quad \Longrightarrow A(1-i)=-32i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Longrightarrow A=\frac { -32i }{ (1-i) } =16(1-i)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"--------------(3)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\quad B=i+{ i }^{ 2 }+{ i }^{ 3 }+{ i }^{ 4 }+......+{ i }^{ 32 }=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"    "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"------------(4)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\quad (3)\quad and\quad (4)in\quad (2)\Rightarrow "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ p=1 }^{ 32 }{ (3p+2){ \left[ \sum _{ q=1 }^{ 10 }{ \left( sin\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 } -icos\frac { 2q\pi  }{ 11 }  \right)  }  \right]  }^{ p } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{48(1-i)}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
